event.title: FSFE website Hackathon
event.body:
The FSFE website pool needs some overhaul, bug squishing, style cleaning and so on. Therefore we will meet for a FSFE website Hackathon on Saturday, September 20, 2014 from 2pm until open end at BeLUG, Lehrter Stra√üe 53, Berlin. For everyone not in Berlin the meeting will take place on IRC. Join us in #fsfe on chat.freenode.net.
The hackathon will take place in parellel to the Software Freedom Day party of the Berlin Linux User Group (BeLUG). Come celebrate SFD with us while helping us maintain our pool of campaign sites.
